Title: The auto dealers outage has been hamstringing car dealerships for days. Experts say that’s the new normal for cyberattacks
Description: Cyberattacks seem to be more devastating than ever and taking targeted companies even longer to resolve.
Author: CNN

Title: Microsoft president to Congress: ‘We accept responsibility’ for cybersecurity failures
Description: Microsoft “accepts responsibility for each and every one” of the issues cited in a scathing US government-backed report on the tech giant’s cybersecurity failings.
Author: CNN

Title: Cyberattack disrupts operations at major US health care network
Description: A cyberattack has disrupted “clinical operations” at major health care nonprofit Ascension, forcing it to take steps to minimize any impact to patient care, an Ascension spokesperson told CNN on Wednesday.
Author: CNN

Title: Police take down $249-a-month global phishing service used by 2,000 hackers
Description: Law enforcement officials in 19 countries have shut down an online platform that earned at least $1 million by selling phishing kits to cybercriminals, helping them launch attacks on tens of thousands of people worldwide.
Author: CNN
